name: java42-signal-generator
short_description:
Java42 Signal Generator is a multiple channel data generation tool for use with the Java42 Data Scope. The generator can generate clean, clear, single or overlapped waveforms of various shapes.  Virtual wires connect the signal generator to the data scope.

Need addition function or features? Open a ticket and give us an overview of what you would like to see in a future release.
summary: Multiple channel data generation tool ( Signal Generator )
